cantilever_beam_vertical_force.png.description: Cantilever beam diagram showing vertical beam with fixed support at bottom, coordinate system (x,y), force F applied, and dimensional labels ℓ, 2ℓ, and point B marked

simply_supported_beam_point_load_moment..description: Simply supported beam with fixed support at left end, roller support at right end, point load F at distance x from left, and moment M applied, with span dimensions ℓ, 2ℓ, ℓ marked

semi_monocoque_structure_3d.png.description: Three-dimensional semi-monocoque structure showing rectangular frame with diagonal bracing, labeled points (1), (2), (3), (4), coordinate system (x,y,z), dimensions ℓ, a, and forces F₃, F₂, F₃ indicated

diagonal_member_force_diagram.png.description: Diagonal member force diagram showing square cross-section rotated 45 degrees with forces F_x, F_y, F_z labeled and dimension d marked

symmetric_three_cell_truss.png.description: Symmetric three-cell truss structure showing triangular configuration with labeled points A, dimensions ℓ, t, a, vertical force F at bottom center, and coordinate system

beam_linearly_varying_distributed_load.p.description: Simply supported beam with linearly varying distributed load increasing from left to right, shown with multiple vertical arrows of increasing height, span length ℓ marked

mohrs_circle_stress_state.png.description: Mohr's circle diagram showing stress state with axes y/mm and x/mm, point A marked at (100, 0), dimensions and angles labeled including t parameter
